title: Zoey Deutch considers anxiety her 'superpower' and says the disorder is one of her motivators
text:
Her acting career began with a starring role on Disney's The Suite Life on Deck.

And Zoey Deutch revealed for the cover story of November's Cosmopolitan magazine that she has long struggled with anxiety.

The 24-year-old star's battle with the disorder started at a very young age, but she's used her experiences to motivate her toward success.

Strong: Zoey Deutch revealed for the cover story of November's Cosmopolitan magazine that she has long struggled with anxiety

Zoey looked positively flawless in the lively series where she paraded around an empty supermarket on a quest for the best snacks.

'I came into this world with anxiety,' she said. 'I used to hold my breath from anxiety when I was a baby and it would make me faint.'

She was born into Hollywood royalty as the daughter of director Howard Deutch and actress Lea Thompson.

Problem solver: The 24-year-old star's battle with the disorder started at a very young age, but she's used her experiences to motivate her toward success

Cool: Zoey looked positively flawless in the lively series where she paraded around an empty supermarket on a quest for the best snacks

'There are times when it's debilitating, and there are times when it makes me laugh, like in the car today when I lost the plot entirely,' she said. 'But I actually feel like my superpower is my anxiety.

'It's one of my key motivators, and it's at the center of my ambition.'

Despite being able to put a positive spin on a challenging issues, Zoey still has fear she'll soon face a quarter-life crisis.

'I came into this world with anxiety,' she said. 'I used to hold my breath from anxiety when I was a baby and it would make me faint.'

'I think I'm nearing it … or in it,' she said. 'There's nothing I can do. I just have to ride the wave.

'I fully have existential thoughts. What does it all mean? How are we here? What were we put on this earth to do? Then I'm like, 'Zoey, just stop.'

She starred in Buffaloed and Zombieland: Double Tap earlier this year and works alongside Gwyneth Paltrow in The Politician.
description: The 24-year-old star's battle with the disorder started at a very young age, but she's used her experiences to motivate her toward success.
